claim: In order to test this, we calculated the AHS_contradiction score and grouped participants into two categories based on Median Split35,36 of AHS_contradiction score (for detailed distribution of AHS scores on the formal logic and naïve dialecticism, see the Supplementary file: Fig. 1–2): those with a formal logic thinking style and those with a naïve dialectism thinking style.
title: Figure 1.
caption: Group differences of brain metrics in the different attitudes towards contradictions. RH: right hemisphere, LH: left hemisphere.

claim: Significant between-group differences in brain metrics are summarized in Fig. 1.
title: Figure 1.
caption: Group differences of brain metrics in the different attitudes towards contradictions. RH: right hemisphere, LH: left hemisphere.

claim: Results are plotted in Fig. 2 and reported in Supplementary Table 3.
title: Figure 2.
caption: Correlation (Pearson’s r value) between resilience measures and demographic variables by group. RSA: Resilience Scale for Adults (ps: personal strength; fc: family cohesion, sr: social resource, sc: social competence, fss: future structured style), MoCA: Montreal Cognitive Assessment, BDI-II: Beck’s Depression Inventory-II. Blue lines represent a negative correlation, while red lines represent a positive correlation, Zhongyong: Zhongyong thinking styles.

claim: Results were plotted in Fig. 3 and reported in Supplementary Table 4.
title: Figure 3.
caption: Correlations between resilience measures and brain metrics by group. RSA: Resilience Scale for Adults (ps: personal strength; fc:family cohesion; sr: social resource; sc: social competence; fss: future structured style); parORB: Pars Orbitalis; infP: Inferior Parietal; midT: Middle Temporal; parOPC: Pars Opercularis; DorAtt: dorsal attention; CenVisu: central visual; SaVenAtt: Salience/Ventral Attention; WMD: Within module degree; PC: participation coefficient; Blue lines represent negative correlation, while red lines represent positive correlation.

claim: The mediation model is visualized in Fig. 4.
title: Figure 4.
caption: Mediation model of attitudes towards contradictions in relations between brain matrices and psychological resilience. AHS: Analysis-Holism Scale.
